## UserWallet.getSigner() method

Get the connected signer

**Signature:**

```typescript
getSigner(): import("@metaplex-foundation/js").IdentityClient;
```

**Returns:**

import("@metaplex-foundation/js").IdentityClient

the signer

## Example

```jsx
const signer = sdk.wallet.getSigner();
```
